abstract: After getting what it considered a low-ball bid from JPMorgan Chase, Washington Mutual decided to go somewhere else to get the capital it needed and ended up in the embrace of private equity firm TPG.
lead_paragraph: After getting what it considered a low-ball bid from JPMorgan Chase, Washington Mutual decided to go somewhere else to get the capital it needed and ended up in the embrace of private equity firm TPG.

headline.main: In TPG’s WaMu Deal, a New Playbook for Regulators?
